articles.description: The former skipper and Chelsea legend is leading the True Blues Consortium, which plans to allow fans to buy a stake in the club for as little as £100.
articles.content:
John Terry has entered the Chelsea ownership race by confirming he is fronting up a £250million consortium looking to buy supporters a 10 per cent share in the club.

articles.author: Tom Blow
articles.title: Jurgen Klopp admits there are two teams he wants Liverpool to avoid in Champions League - The Mirror
articles.description: Liverpool will face Benfica in the quarter-finals of the Champions League and will only play an English side if they and Manchester City or Chelsea reach the final in Paris
articles.content:
Jurgen Klopp has admitted his relief at avoiding Manchester City and Chelsea in Friday's Champions League draw, which revealed Liverpool's path to the final.

articles.title: Arsenal: Martin Keown risks the wrath of Gunners fans by backing rivals Tottenham for top four spot - Daily Mail
articles.description: The former Arsenal defender said that because of each club's remaining fixtures, Antonio Conte's side are more likely to qualify for the Champions League than their London rivals.
articles.content:
Martin Keown has backed Tottenham to finish in fourth place come the end of the season, despite Arsenal being ahead currently.
